items.q: How do I track my bus?
items.a: Open the Track page and select your assigned route; you will see the live bus marker when the driver starts the trip (mobile drivers only).

items.q: How do I raise a waiting flag?
items.a: On the Track page, choose your stop and tap 'Raise Waiting Flag'; allow location permission to provide precise coordinates.
Drivers and students can submit feedback via the footer. Admins and moderators review and may delete feedback; feedback is auto-removed after 30 days.
